rm(list=ls())
library(ISLR)
attach(College)
College.rownames= rownames(College)
summary(College)
pairs(College[,1:10])
boxplot(Outstate~Private,data=College)
Elite=rep("No",nrow(College))
Elite[College$Top10perc>50]="Yes"
Elite=as.factor(Elite)
college=data.frame(College,Elite)
summary(college)
boxplot(Outstate~Elite,data=college)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
hist(Top10perc)
hist(Top10perc, breaks=20)
hist(Apps)
hist(F.Undergrad,breaks=10)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
plot(S.F.Ratio,Grad.Rate,main="Scatterplot of Student-Faculty Ratio and Graduation Rate",
     xlab="Student-Faculty Ratio",ylab="Graduation Rate",col="blue")
abline(lm(Grad.Rate~S.F.Ratio),col="red")
